titles.title: Bovine Growth Hormone User Assessment Act

To amend the Agricultural Act of 1949 to require the Secretary of Agriculture to reduce the price received by producers for milk that is produced by cows injected with bovine growth hormone, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Livestock.

bill.summary: 4/28/1993--Introduced. Bovine Growth Hormone User Assessment Act - Amends the Agricultural Act of 1949 to reduce the price received for milk produced by cows injected with bovine growth hormone.
